entry.title: Bridgette Fu
entry.summary:
Author: Deala

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,080Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 16

Summary: After the defeat of Chrysalis, Ladybug's team found out about both her and Monarch's identity. After placing the miraculous back in the box, Marinette flees to Gotham with a new identity. Also she joins Dream Academy.
